subject: Critical Thinking
title: Why Every Decision Is a Bet
description: A quick win: understand Why Every Decision Is a Bet.

hook.text: You choose a restaurant without reading reviews. You take a job without knowing the boss.

buildup.text: Annie Duke, former poker champion: every decision is a bet on an uncertain future with incomplete information.

discovery.text: We can't eliminate uncertainty â€” only manage it. Good decisions can have bad outcomes. Bad decisions can get lucky.

twist.text: Judging decisions by outcomes is the 'resulting' fallacy. A good bet can lose. That doesn't make it a bad bet.

climax.text: Decision quality and outcome quality are different. Focus on the process, not just the result.

punchline.text: You can't control outcomes. You can control how you decide.

quiz.question: What is the 'resulting' fallacy?
options: Judging a decision only by its outcome instead of its process
Making decisions based on results alone
